cmp: 尺 (a Chinese foot (M)/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a note musical note on traditional Chinese scale)
只 (earth-spirit/peace, (a measure word, for birds and some animals, etc.)/single/only, M for one of a pair, only/merely/just/but, but/only)
mng: 8 in. length unit of Zhou dynasty

exm.mng: to be almost within reach, to be close at hand
